documents.document: Perfect wet Sunday afternoon activities: building lego while listening to @clattner_llv on @atpfm https://t.co/RI8MKuSbix
Only in America do you have a cup holder in your trolley for your festive Starbucks, after Christmas #plusclub https://t.co/1RdYhiZzGR
My last Peppermint Mocha of the holiday season :( https://t.co/8bby88azuP
Thanks to @cooksimo1 showing me Portrait Mode I am the proud new owner of an iPhone 7 Plus, matte black #plusclub https://t.co/IjXcUboYmv
@hackerssidekick I'm going to have to use that photo out of context at some point!
When can I start teaching Hazel ruby @nicktmro? I'm guessing older than 6 months :( https://t.co/6oIQUCpLBG
@hapiben what did you think of the course?
@hapiben yay, that course was great!!!!
@nicktmro https://t.co/JHq8kjutuA gives me a 404. Hyping anticipation or bug?
@nicktmro yeah that jumped out at me as well. Well done Apple!
@Ewok_13 Typical spelling mistake from @DomPost https://t.co/rXnrA8z7Y0
I just backed The New Glif: A Tripod Mount for Smartphones, Redesigned on @Kickstarter https://t.co/X0LyvMtRGR
@1amstudios isn't he just fulfilling the 'everything must be bigger in America' stereotype?
Does anyone have a 45W MacBookAir MagSafe ("L" style) adapter lying around? Apple wants $150 for a new one ... https://t.co/sQwefXq5I1
Current status: behind the wheel of a ~450hp 1968 Corvette Stingray. My clutch leg is now sore! https://t.co/My4Wxwj4ei
@nicktmro sorry. Jokes are so much funnier when you need to explain them
@nicktmro why? is there something special it does? I see tvOS app for streaming also
@nicktmro I was thinking it was too early for WWDC. Did you or @cooksimo1 win a ticket to WWDC in the lottery?
@nullfry unfortunately not sorry. If you don't have access to your email address anymore there is nothing they can do :(
@nullfry I don't have the password for the account or access to the (old) email address anymore. I've contacted support, will let you know
@nullfry hey! Yeah I don't use that handle anymore. I'll change it and let you grab it ;)
@caseyliss That's so cool! I love hearing these stories, people can make any change they want. I went Java -> Rails and never looked back!
@nicktmro it it not weird that we have Siri on the phone but not on AppleTV? What's stopping it? Doesn't seem to be technical? Maybe load?
@nicktmro can you ask them when Siri is coming to NZ Apple TV users? Love my AppleTV but I know it could be awesomer!
“Behind the Lens: 2015 Year in Photographs” by @WhiteHouse photographer Pete Souza https://t.co/0UgHZXQ79N
@ghammadi I'm trying to get to @webstock too. We should catch up for dinner!!!!
@fogonwater I will always fondly remember "As a developer I want Solr4 to be stable so I can sleep at night"
@fogonwater so, 'development' then :P
@YouDoCrew at least there were pastries! https://t.co/ogZ6Wz248B
@nicktmro I'm about to buy one the moment that @plexapp is released. Can you have a go when it comes out?
@cloud66 What user permission do I need to 'Add an SSH key' when deploying to my own server?
And the 'Hail Mary' of the Rails world `spring stop` saves me again!
@mwgnz yeah I noticed that too. Not worth it even if the plans are cheaper (no VDSL fee)
Every time I look to backup my 100GB photos, a new provider comes out. First Amazon Cloud Drive, now Google Nearline https://t.co/G5RxQg1EOE
It's nice to be back in NZ "Spark will have *a* technician on standby at the stadium to monitor the network". Just 1? http://t.co/yzx3jxdZOI
@fogonwater Least. Comforting. Announcement. Ever
@hackerssidekick @nicktmro it's also on the menu in San Fran. I'm scared to have it ruin flat whites for me but I'll try it & report back
Every set of lights since I got on has been red and my Newlands bus has accelerated through them all. This should be a fun ride
I have 4 spare (free) tickets to the basketball tonight at 7pm if anyone is interested? http://t.co/dVJ9dVAA07
@newportandy "at 3AM in the morning. You want to be able to roll out of the bed, grab your partners, and develop the idea" is not a thing
@imyke you should check out the recently updated @memrise iOS app. Huge update, soooo much better than when you tried it last
@ghammadi Wow "Human error is a consequence of other things. Never a cause" is prophetic. I'm LOVING these drawings btw, keep it up!
@OvercastFM I also don't always listen in chronological order as there are podcasts my wife will put up with and some she won't!
@OvercastFM I would like to see it back if possible. It was nice to easily find podcasts I had fallen asleep to the night before with timer
@OvercastFM Ahhh. Aso, I see you removed the 'Play Status' filter from the Playlist settings. Why was that? Is it coming back?
@OvercastFM Awesome, yep it's back up. What was it?
@OvercastFM I (and everyone I've talked to) are getting HTTP 503 errors from https://t.co/aTrWKxxz06. I presume you know about it?
Good to see that #genderstereotypes are being drilled into college kids for the beep test http://t.co/Tv7GmsDEqY
@hackerssidekick @mojocoffeejapan yeah it was totally as good as @mojocoffeenz. Also surprise Anzac biscuit!
Went to backstreets of Tokyo to find a decent flat white from @mojocoffeejapan. Totally worth the adventure http://t.co/rrCfO7jJnu
A weirdly alienating experience at Tokyo Apple Store - all the watches are behind glass. Also thin MacBook is thin http://t.co/CnQNkm8Jfn
@mrGrazy @fogonwater @benedictaluan epic! Hopefully it has been simplified so much it needed to be redone?
Japan in a nutshell - amazing breakfast sets, Shinkansen, wide city-scapes and unintelligible signs http://t.co/qRULHP6rCU
Enjoying the awesome food and street-scene in Seoul http://t.co/PzRarxIbzr
Am now in Tokyo, along with 4 million people taking the Tokyo underground daily. That, and eating European pastries http://t.co/MijRE6PsS3
@KiwibankNZ iOS8 and TouchID have been out for ages, when is the Kiwibank app going to support unlock via TouchID?
@AlishaDaya awesome post, it was fun building the app. Made any progress since?
@fogonwater @Sereeena Look at this little internet thing bringing people together!
@Sereeena The cartographer/map nerd I was talking about last night is @fogonwater who works at the National Library/DigitalNZ
Spent 15 mins trying to work out why my javascript function wasn't working. Turns out I was missing ye olde 'return'. Thanks #ruby
Found the perfect coding soundtrack: Miyazaki/Studio Ghibli playlist: http://t.co/DK1MKl80rT にほんご
@four_seven Wow I thought people were going the other way. Is unicorn not web scale?
@AlishaDaya I've been looking for that chocolate milk for ages. People literally run across the supermarket for the 2 mins it's in stock
@four_seven This is Randy Pausch Last Lecture I was talking about. Long but well well well worth it https://t.co/d5SNM1zMNB
@daveharris I would really like your account name if you aren't using it anymore. Would you think about giving it up?
@AlishaDaya You just now need to hook it up to Heroku/Ninefold and Codeship.io and you will away
@AlishaDaya So excited to submit a pull request to you! https://t.co/k5RZKSExED
@Anthony_Mace @Railscamp_NZ @four_seven @AlishaDaya I love the internet
@Railscamp_NZ Do you an email address for Anthony (sorry don't know his last name) from #rcnz5?
#rcnz5, the only conference I've been to where speakers and attendees are treated the same and everyone goes swimming
@AlishaDaya @AlishaDaya the fact that you are now doing hipster coffee should be enough for Wellingtonians and Melbournians
@DigitalNZ do you know the work plan tables get cut off on mobile (iPhone 5S)?
Wow this really is living in the future https://t.co/QwCxHjeLmV #2factorauthentication
@fogonwater That is amazing
Put myself down on the speaking list at @Railscamp_NZ. Self, no backing out now!
Having an awesome time in Christchurch with @Ewok_13. Gondola, tram, Hagley Park & #hipstercoffee at #restartmall http://t.co/MFxo0GBlAv
Sounds Air is the only airline in NZ which does impromptu whale watching on the way #summer http://t.co/VC0wseJGk4
@fogonwater agreed, it's been on fire recently. Wish there was a better way to surface stuff on http://t.co/oAN3YsnuWy for non-nerds to see
@benedictaluan you are most welcome. Chef has a special place in my heart #nerdlove. Also @getssj is taking me out to lunch on Friday so win
Just heard that a guy going 8 laps of Taupo's 160km has completed his first lap in 5h34m. That's my target time for one lap :(
I put my money where my mouth is, I donated to help make a second season of @serial http://t.co/iKKDipqms7
So this guy loves @serial so much he is going to be murdered http://t.co/5aX3iY6t49
@nicktmro Wow I had no idea that you had 30 mobile devs, that's crazy!
@mlascarides I have a great little D-Link DNS323. 2 drive bays, gigabit, and it hackable so mine runs a full Debian install from USB drive
@fogonwater @serial there has got to be something up with Jay's story. I wanna know so badly!
@fogonwater we are listening to @serial and are totally and utterly hooked
Sometimes I wish Ruby was a complied language #thingsineverthoughtidsay #refactoringwithoutspecs
@fogonwater @mlascarides Sorry I had a lot of spammers replying when I hash tagged things ages ago so protected tweets....
@mlascarides This is amazing ;)
36% smaller Rails memory footprint through Benchmarking http://t.co/VKpCLQAJ6M
This Is Why Australians Hate Starbucks http://t.co/vP1iP07z4z #coffeesnob
@ow Ha awesome, my brother @1amstudios works at Riverbed. Pintrest's offices looked super sweet
@Railscamp_NZ Do we need to be there *before* 4pm for the bus? Like will a flight landing at 4pm be too late?
Really inspiring hearing people leave jobs to follow their passion, the Relay.fm podcast network. Congrats @imyke http://t.co/eFXYOtdkrv
Hmmm I wonder when Yosemite and iOS8 were released this month ... http://t.co/W31evQLbRz
@mwgnz Wow view looks sweet! Have a great time ;)
@ow You really couldn't make this stuff up
@dryglue http://t.co/1Is8B1eqV0 http://t.co/hfOHqIYVLV http://t.co/RpHVnKimvw http://t.co/9M89VIgllf & pure comedy: http://t.co/zF7K8j9WZI

@fogonwater @DigitalNZ Ohhh wow, would love to catch up when you're back in Wellington
